RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 10500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EL ROSILLO sprinted to a daylight lead soon after the start, set all the pace unchallenged and won as much the best. MY TWO AUNT JOANS chased the winner and was no match while clearly second best. RESERVATION went evenly. BUILT LIKE TARZAN chased the winner through the turn then weakened. ALY STONE trailed. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION FRACTIONAL TIMES WERE UNAVAILABLE. FINAL TIME WAS HAND TIMED. FRACTIONS PROVIDED AND FINAL TIME CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: El Rosillo
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, unchallenged, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Aunt Joans
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, no match for winner, clearly second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 12100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COAL TOWN ROAD was bumped at the start, rushed up to press the pace three wide, matched strides two wide into the stretch and shook clear late under left handed urging. THE COACHMAN away alertly, set a pressured inside rivals into the stretch then couldn't handle the winner. THE EQUINEST had speed from the start along the inside, shifted out three wide on the turn and finished with good courage. SUNNY BEAST pressed the early pace two wide, dropped back a bit then faded in deep stretch. BAYOU SHACK bumped the winner at the start, moved up three wide on the turn then came up empty. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION FRACTIONAL TIMES WERE UNAVAILABLE. FINAL TIME WAS HAND TIMED. FRACTIONS PROVIDED AND FINAL TIME CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: The Coachman
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: The Equinest
ENTRY.OWNER: Blue Star Bird Eye Synd LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, angled out turn, finished well, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Bayou Shack
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, middle move, 3 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Coal Town Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, rushed up, dueled 2 wide, shook clear late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOURBON BUNS waited behind the top trio of rivals into the far turn, shifted out three wide nearing the quarter pole, rallied under right handed urging to make the lead in deep stretch and drew clear under brisk handling. FLAXEN set a pressured pace inside rivals into the far turn, was headed before the quarter pole, fought back gamely then couldn't handle the winner. ANDIAMA vied for the early lead three wide, gained a narrow advantage on the far turn, battled into the stretch, drifted out late and was outfinished. MON PARADIS failed to menace. PRINCESS MORO was no factor. SWIFT RITHMS pressed the pace two wide into the far turn then weakened. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION FRACTIONAL TIMES WERE UNAVAILABLE. FINAL TIME WAS HAND TIMED. FRACTIONS PROVIDED AND FINAL TIME CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Flaxen
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, dug in gamely, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Buns
ENTRY.COMMENT: waited, shifted 3 wide 1/4 pole, surged right urging, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Andiama
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead 3 wide, led 2nd turn, drifted late, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 7 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STEPPER broke a step slow, trailed down the backstretch, circled her field at will on the far turn, made the lead nearing the top of the stretch then widened the balance of the trip to win as much the best while being ridden out. DATTTSAFANCYFOX stalked the early pace, slipped through along the rail to make the lead nearing the quarter pole then was no match for the winner. ALSANAH had speed from the start, moved up three wide before a half, then was outfinished. LADY GIULIANA away alertly, set the pace into the far turn, kept pressure into the stretch two wide and faded late. WILDCAT DREAM failed to menace. PACIFIC GROVE pressed the early pace two wide and was through after a half. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION FRACTIONAL TIMES WERE UNAVAILABLE. FINAL TIME WAS HAND TIMED. FRACTIONS PROVIDED AND FINAL TIME CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Stepper
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, circled field 2nd turn, full of run, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Pacific Grove
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Datttsafancyfox
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, slipped through inside 2nd turn, no match winner

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MARCH 7. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AZTEC EMPIRE unhurried early, closed willingly five then three wide, made the lead before the furlong marker and won under brisk handling. DEBDURITE stalked the pace along the inside, split horses nearing the quarter pole then couldn't handle the winner despite a game effort. KING ANDRES pressed the pace two then three wide into the far turn, gained a narrow lead, battled into the stretch then was outfinished. VISKI JONES moved up six wide on the far turn then leveled off. GEH SCHNELL brushed at the start, offered a mild bid four wide on the second turn then failed to sustain that bid. ADANO failed to menace. GOTSOMEMOJO was no factor. AULD LANGE SYNE settled mid pack, advanced five wide on the far turn then came up empty. VALEROSO set a pressured pace along the inside for nearly six furlongs then folded. HONORABLE was brushed at the start, hung five wide through the clubhouse turn, prompted the pace three wide into the far turn then flattened out. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION FRACTIONAL TIMES WERE UNAVAILABLE. FINAL TIME WAS HAND TIMED. FRACTIONS PROVIDED AND FINAL TIME CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: King Andres
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Adano
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Debdurite
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, split horses 1/4 pole, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Aztec Empire
ENTRY.OWNER: Cline, Robert and Lucas, Robert A.

ENTRY.NAME: Valeroso
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, stopped lane

ENTRY.NAME: Geh Schnell
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed start, middle move, 4 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Honorable
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed start, pressed pace, 3wide, through after 3/4

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWEET BELEN sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set all the pace unchallenged and prevailed under strong handling. LUCKY TO HAVE ME allowed to settle, swung wide, rallied in the middle of the racetrack through the stretch and got up for second. WHOVILLE saved ground early, altered course to the six path at the top of the stretch then was outfinished. ORBITING THE SKY passed tiring rivals along the rail. SHE MAKES ME TIZZY chased the winner from the five path and faded in the stretch. AUNT STELLA stalked the pace from the six path into the turn and was through after a half. BLACK BUTTE trailed. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION FRACTIONAL TIMES WERE UNAVAILABLE. FINAL TIME WAS HAND TIMED. FRACTIONS PROVIDED AND FINAL TIME CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Belen
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace, unchallenged, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky to Have Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, swung wide, rallied mid track, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Whoville
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground early, altered course 6path, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Re gistered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GO STELLAIRE settled with the second flight three wide, responded readily when set down on the far turn, rallied two wide to make the lead at the quarter pole, quickly opened a daylight lead at the top of the stretch and prevailed under strong handling. PRESCIENCE unhurried early, rallied through the stretch in the five path and finished second best. PETTIGO GIRL allowed to settle, offered a mild bid three wide on the second turn, dropped inside in mid stretch then was outfinished. GRAND PRIZE passed tiring rivals. ACT LIKE A LADY chased the pace along the inside for five and one half furlongs then weakened. STYLISH ASH close from the start, moved up four wide before a half then came up empty. NINJA KITTEN broke in front and quickly opened a daylight lead, set the pace for a little over six furlongs then was used up. ROAD TEST trailed. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION FRACTIONAL TIMES WERE UNAVAILABLE. FINAL TIME WAS HAND TIMED. FRACTIONS PROVIDED AND FINAL TIME CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Ninja Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace 1/4 pole, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Prescience
ENTRY.OWNER: Manning Simon and White Charles H

ENTRY.NAME: Pettigo Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: Kuntz Mark D and Dalton Ken

ENTRY.NAME: Go Stellaire
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight 3 wide, quick move 2 wide 2nd turn, drew clear,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 7 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowanc es) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOVELY LISA away alertly, set pressured all the pace under pressure, dug in late two wide and prevailed under brisk handling. CALLMEMARTHAJANE never far back, loomed boldly along the rail into the stretch and just missed in a determined effort. SLICKSNEAKYANDFAST allowed to settle, found her best stride late inside rivals. HONORIFIQUE trailed early, swung outside and closed a gap late four wide. YEARS AGO stalked the pace in the five path into the stretch and faded late. MIMI'S GOLDEN RING pressured the winner two wide into the stretch and weakened late. SKY was no factor. GRAY ROYALITY had good early speed inside and was through after a half. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION FRACTIONAL TIMES WERE UNAVAILABLE. FINAL TIME WAS HAND TIMED. FRACTIONS PROVIDED AND FINAL TIME CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Lovely Lisa
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, dug in 2 wide, prevailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Callmemarthajane
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, loomed boldly rail, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Honorifique
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, late gain, 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Slicksneakyandfast
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, best stride late inside
